section.title: sales orders search for Search Orders
section.para: You are able to quickly and easily locate the sales orders you're looking for on the Sales Order screen. Use the search filter options to narrow down your search.
Here are some tips for using this screen:

listitem.para: Narrow your search using a date range. By default, the date range is set to the current date.
Use the customer's original P/O number to locate a sales order.
Find all orders related to a specific sales rep.
Hide closed orders to only show open orders during a date range you specify.
Search for sales orders created by specific users, with the Created By filter option.
